title: BRIGHT 2 BEDROOM CLOSE TO TRAIN STATION
posting_body: ['BRIGHT 2 BEDROOM CLOSE TO TRAIN STATION', '2 bedroom that comes with a separate kitchen, stainless steel appliances, and granite countertops .', 'The rooms are bright and gets lots of sun.', 'All have been recently upgraded with new kitchens, bathrooms, custom closets and other new finishes.', 'A convenient, centrally located laundry room accommodates all residents.', 'Shopping such as Bloomingdales is located just a few blocks to the buildings.', 'The rest of the city and the Financial District are easily accessible from the subway at 66th Street and Lexington Avenue.', 'Bewen Xie', 'Phone: 646-258-0988', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'Price: $4,995', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Case By Case', 'Building Amenities', 'Elevator', 'Laundry', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood', 'Renovated', 'Marble Bath', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Light', 'Eat In Kitchen', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'New York Living Solutions - Keller Williams New York City \xa0 646-258-0988 \xa0 FAX 212-227-1120 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Bewen Xie at 646-258-0988']
